channel.title: C# on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in C# on Some Title

item.title: First deep learning in C#-imitation of Python implementation-
item.description: Deep learning with #C# (matrix calculation) This time, I created only the program that calculates the matrix necessary for deep learning. The book I referred to is “Making Deep Learning (O’Reilly)” from scratch. This book is very easy to understand and I think it is a good book, so I recommend it. It’s not a manga, but it doesn’t stop…I was so interested. Since I have only read about half of it, there are many things I do not understand well, but this time, I made a matrix calculation program in C#.
